text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Oguri, where are you?!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Dang it. I couldn’t find her anywhere, not in the onsen, not 
in the restaurant, and not in the lobby. Do you think she left? 
Ugh, this was supposed to be a group vacation!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I hope she’s okay... There’s so much delicious 
food in Osaka, so the smell may have lured her in.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That sounds stupid. No... since it’s Oguri, I guess 
anything is possible. Ah, whatever! I’ll go look for her.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
This is delicious... It’s so sweet and 
tender... Osaka’s fried carrot is amazing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Wait, where am I? I only planned to snack a little 
bit then head back, but I don’t remember the way back...

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oguri! If you come out now, I’ll treat you to something yummy!

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
I know you’re a good girl, so please come back. 
Hey, Tama-chan, have you tried calling her phone?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I did, but I think her phone’s dead... 
And I told her to charge it before going to bed too!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: *munch* *munch* It’s been a long time since I got lost... What should I do? I wonder if the others are worried about me...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Nngh, I feel so anxious...and when I get anxious, I get hungry... 
Umm, excuse me...can I have five servings of takoyaki please.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Wow, it’s so lively here! I can really feel the Osaka-energy♪ 
Hmm? There’s a huge crowd over here, I wonder what’s going on.

text_block_list.name: Attendant A
text_block_list.text:
Holy...! How many kilos can you eat?! 
Uma Musume sure can eat a lot, huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: *munch* *munch* *munch* *munch* *sniffle*

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Oguri-san?! Wait, are you crying?! What’s the matter?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ugh, I can’t believe this!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
We’re just lucky that Laurel happened to pass by!
But miracles don’t happen often, you know?!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I’m really sorry... I just really wanted to try 
the breakfast from your hometown...then I got lost...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But...every bit of it was so delicious... 
And being able to experience what you 
grew up with made me so happy... I’m so sorry...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh?! What’s with you?! Ah jeez, whatever!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
As long as you reflect on what you did, it’s fine. 
Let’s start our Summer Walk over again. I know a place 
with the best pork buns, so let’s go get some together!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: The best? Thank you so much, Tama!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Oh, as a thank you, Laurel, you can have these 
lottery tickets that I got from the nearby shopping 
district. I got a bunch today, so here you go.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (So, using the tickets Oguri gave me, I decided to try my luck at the lottery...)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (...but I never expected to win the top prize, a trip to Hokkaido♪ Hehe, this year’s Summer Walk sure is great, huh?)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (I’ve already seen the racecourse and had some delicious ice cream and melon. Now all that’s left is...Brian’s rehabilitation.)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Hehe... I wonder if the fan event is going well.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
We're about to begin the Lunchtime Stroll Event. 
It's essentially a facility tour. Whoever wants to come, follow me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hey now! If you keep talking like that you’ll scare away your 
fans, especially the little ones! I’m sorry for her attitude.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Don’t worry, she’s not a bad Uma Musume. She’s been thinking 
about this event for a long time, and even asked Hishi Ama for he—

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Oi! ...Ama-san, why is she even here?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
She said she was bored so I decided to invite her. 
Anyway, let’s focus on the fan event! Let’s go before the sun sets.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, seems like they’ve got enough help already. That's a relief. 
In that case, I might secretly enjoy the fan event a bit myself♪

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
I love this park! It’s great for picnics and
it’s so spacious! It also smells super nice!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Don’t get overexcited, or else you might trip...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
We’ve also got a ranch attached to the facility! 
You can try milking cows if you’d like, the ice 
cream from their milk is so delicious! Right, Brian?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah... You sure know a lot about this place, Ama-san.

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Look, a fish! There’s so many of them!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You can do river rafting and some fishing here. 
But remember that you need a reservation in order to do so!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Don’t you know a little too much...?

text_block_list.name: Brian's Fan
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Ama-chan, you studied up a bunch to 
help out Brian-san, didn’t you? How kind... 
Just listening to the way you explain things is so soothing...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (And that’s how Brian-chan's Lunchtime Stroll Event concluded smoothly and harmoniously without any trouble...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: How much longer do you plan on lurking around?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! I didn’t expect you to catch me since I was being 
so discreet. The fan event was so much fun by the way!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Tch... I only did it because I was asked by a caretaker I'm 
indebted to. Otherwise, I wouldn't bother doing all of this.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh by the way, Laurel, didn’t you mention 
you were having issues with your legs?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Haha, don’t worry about that! I’m feeling much better today!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
You two should eat more! 
Eating is how you get stronger after all!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
She’s right! Food is the source of energy! 
Alright, I’m gonna prepare a feast for us tonight, so 
make sure to eat to your heart's content everyone!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: (For us, summer is important for recharging. I hope we’ll have enough energy for what’s coming in autumn...)
